guide.summary: most people have the dart tag set with the strikefires. they are powerfull without modding, but if looking at this, your either A: employed by hasbro; or B: trying to mod your gun(DUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!).
guide.title: Strikefire Mod
